的: 白 (white; clear, pure, unblemished; bright) marks the meaning; 勺 (sháo) partners with — "possessive particle".
一: Represents heaven (天), earth (旦), or the number 1 — "one".
是: To speak 日 directly 疋 — "to be".
不: A bird flying toward the sky 一 — "not".
了: A child swaddled in blanklets; compare 子 — "particle indicating completed action".
人: The legs of a human being — "person".
我: A hand 扌 holding a weapon 戈 — "I, me".
在: 土 (soil) marks the meaning while 才 (cái, ability) hints the sound — "at, in, on".
有: 月 (moon; month) marks the meaning; 月 (yuè) partners with — "to have".
他: An additional, "also" 也 person 亻 — "he, him".
这: 辶 (to walk; walking) marks the meaning; 文 (wén) partners with — "this".
中: A line 丨 through the center of a box 口 — "middle, center".
大: A man 人 with outstretched arms — "big, large".
来: A wheat plant that has not yet borne fruit; compare 來 — "to come".
上: One stroke on top of another; compare 下 (below) — "up, above".
国: Treasure 玉 within a country's borders 囗 — "country".
个: A tally 丨 of people 人 — "measure word (general)".
到: 至 (reach) marks the meaning while 刂 (dāo, knife) hints the sound — "to arrive".
说: 讠 (words) marks the meaning while 兑 (duì, cash) hints the sound — "to say, speak".
们: 亻 (man) marks the meaning while 门 (mén, gate) hints the sound — "plural suffix".
为: 丶 (dot) marks the meaning; 力 (lì) partners with — "for, because of".
子: A child in a wrap, with outstretched arms but bundled legs — "son, child".
和: 口 (mouth) marks the meaning while 禾 (hé, cereal) hints the sound — "and, with".
你: Pronoun 尔 for a person 亻 — "you".
地: 土 (soil) marks the meaning while 也 (yě, also) hints the sound — "earth, land".
出: A sprout 屮 growing out of a container 凵 — "to go out".
道: 辶 (to walk) marks the meaning while 首 (shǒu, chief) hints the sound — "way, method".
也: 乚 (secret, hidden, mysterious; small, minute; to conceal) marks the meaning — "also, too".
年: A man 干 carrying grain, representing the annual harvest — "year".
得: A hand 寸 grabbing a shell 旦 — "particle / to get / must".
就: 尤 (especially) marks the meaning while 京 (jīng, capital city) hints the sound — "then, at once".
那: 阝 (place, town, city) marks the meaning — "that".
要: A woman 女 with hands on her waist 覀 — "to want, need".
下: One stroke under another; compare 上 (above) — "down, below".
以: 人 (man, person; people) marks the meaning — "to use, according to".
生: A shoot 屮 growing in the soil 土 — "to be born, life".
会: People 人 speaking 云 — "can, will, meeting".
家: 宀 (roof) marks the meaning while 豕 (shǐ, pig) hints the sound — "home, family".
可: 丁 (male adult) marks the meaning while 口 (kǒu, mouth) hints the sound — "can, may".
后: 口 (mouth; entrance, gate, opening) marks the meaning — "after, behind".
过: 辶 (to walk) marks the meaning while 咼 (guō, to chat) hints the sound — "to pass, particle".
天: The heavens 一 above a man 大 — "sky, heaven, day".
能: A bear's head 厶, body ⺼, and claws 匕 — "can, able".
好: A woman 女 with a son 子 — "good, well".
都: 阝 (place) marks the meaning while 者 (zhě, that which) hints the sound — "all, both".
然: 灬 (fire) marks the meaning while 肰 (rán, dog meat) hints the sound — "correct, so".
没: 氵 (water) marks the meaning while 殳 (shū, tool) hints the sound — "not, without".
于: 二 (two; twice) marks the meaning; 亅 (jué) partners with — "at, in, on".
起: 走 (to walk) marks the meaning while 己 (jǐ, self) hints the sound — "to rise, start".
还: Not 不 moving 辶 — "still / to return".
发: 又 (and, also, again, in addition) marks the meaning — "to send out, emit".
成: 戈 (spear, lance, halberd) marks the meaning; 丁 (dīng) partners with — "to become, succeed".
事: 亅 (hook) marks the meaning — "matter, thing, event".
只: Simple words 八 coming from the mouth 口 — "only / measure word".
作: A person 亻 making something for the first time 乍; 乍 also provides the pronunciation — "to do, make".
当: ⺌ marks the meaning; 彐 (jì) partners with — "to be, serve as".
想: 心 (heart) marks the meaning while 相 (xiāng, mutual) hints the sound — "to think, want".
看: Shielding one's eyes 目 with a hand 手 to look to the distance — "to look, see".
文: A tattooed chest, representing writing — "language, culture".
无: 无 (no, not; lacking, -less) marks the meaning — "without, none".
开: Simplified form of 開; hands 廾 lifting the latch 一 of a door — "to open, start".
手: A hand with the fingers splayed — "hand".
十: 十 (ten, tenth; complete; perfect) marks the meaning — "ten".
用: 用 (to use, to employ, to apply; use) marks the meaning — "to use".
主: A lamp 王 with a flame 丶 — "main, master".
行: To take small steps 亍 with one's feet 彳 — "to walk / row, line".
方: 方 (square, rectangle; side; region; flag) marks the meaning — "square, direction".
又: A right hand, representing a pair; compare 左 — "again, also".
如: A wife 女 following her husband's words 口 — "if, like".
所: An axe 斤 swung at a door 户 — "place, that which".
本: A tree 木 with its roots highlighted — "root, origin, measure word for books".
见: Simplified form of 見; a man 儿 with the eye 目 emphasized — "to see, meet".
经: 纟 (silk) marks the meaning while 工 (gōng, labor) hints the sound — "to pass through, classic".
公: To divide 八 what is private 厶 — "public, male".
同: Sharing a common 凡 tongue 口 — "same, together".
三: Three parallel lines; compare 一 (one) and 二 (two) — "three".
已: 己 (self, oneself; personal, private; 6th heavenly stem) marks the meaning — "already, to stop".
老: A person bent over with long hair 匕 and a crutch; compare 耂 — "old".
两: Two people 从 together in a cart — "two".
长: Simplified form of 長; an old man with long hair and a cane — "long / to grow".
把: 扌 (hand) marks the meaning while 巴 (bā, to desire) hints the sound — "to hold, handle".
小: Dividing 八 by a line 亅 — "small".
什: A file of ten 十 people 亻 — "what (in 什么)".
但: 亻 (man, person; people) marks the meaning; 旦 (dàn) partners with — "but, however".
因: 囗 (enclosure; border) marks the meaning; 大 (dà) partners with — "because, cause".
此: 匕 (spoon) marks the meaning while 止 (zhǐ, to stop) hints the sound — "this".
她: A woman 女 beside you 也 — "she, her".
水: A river running between two banks; compare 川 — "water".
新: A freshly chopped 斤 tree 亲 — "new".
学: A building 冖 where children 子 study; ⺍ provides the pronunciation — "to study, learn".
现: To see 见 jade 王; 见 also provides the pronunciation — "current, appear".
去: 厶 (private, secret) marks the meaning; 土 (tǔ) partners with — "to go".
么: 丿 (slash) marks the meaning; 厶 (sī) partners with — "particle (in 什么, 怎么)".
民: An eye 巳 pierced by a dagger 戈, an old mark of slavery — "people, citizen".
分: Pieces 八 being further subdivided with a knife 刀 — "to divide, minute".
它: 宀 (roof; house) marks the meaning; 匕 (bǐ) partners with — "it".
回: Originally, a spiral signifying return — "to return".
最: To take place 取 under the sun 日 (that is, everywhere) — "most".
而: 而 (and, and then, and yet; but) marks the meaning — "and, but".
多: Two nights 夕, suggesting many — "many, much".
自: A nose; in China, people refer to themselves by pointing to their noses — "self".
二: Two parallel lines; compare 一 (one) and 三 (three) — "two".
进: 辶 (to walk) marks the meaning while 井 (jǐng, well) hints the sound — "to enter".
力: A plow's head representing strength — "power, strength".
之: A foot meaning "to follow"; cursive version of 止 — "possessive particle (classical)".
问: 口 (mouth) marks the meaning while 门 (mén, gate) hints the sound — "to ask".
很: 彳 (to step with the left foot) marks the meaning while 艮 (gěn, blunt) hints the sound — "very".
着: 目 (eye; to look, to see; division, topic) marks the meaning; 羊 (yáng) partners with — "particle / to touch".
重: A burden carried for a thousand 千 miles 里 — "heavy / again".
明: The light of the sun 日 and moon 月 — "bright, clear".
里: Unit of measure for farm 田 land 土 — "inside, li (unit)".
儿: Simplified form of 兒, a picture of a child; compare 人 — "son, child, suffix".
其: 八 (eight; all around, all sides) marks the meaning — "his, her, its".
通: 辶 (to walk) marks the meaning while 甬 (yǒng, path) hints the sound — "to pass through".
与: 一 (one; a, an; alone) marks the meaning — "and, with".
实: 宀 (roof; house) marks the meaning; 头 (tóu) partners with — "real, solid".
将: Going to bed 丬 at night 夕, a predictable future — "will, about to".
外: Night-time 夕 divinations 卜; the supernatural, the foreign — "outside".
被: 衤 (cloth) marks the meaning while 皮 (pí, skin) hints the sound — "by (passive marker)".
等: Bamboo strips ⺮ laid before a court 寺 — "to wait, etc".
几: A small table; compare 丌 — "how many, several".
理: 王 (king) marks the meaning while 里 (lǐ, unit of distance equal to 0.5km) hints the sound — "logic, to manage".
度: Twenty 廿 people 又 meeting inside a building 广 to deliberate — "degree, measure".
第: Bamboo strips ⺮ arrayed in sequence; 弟 provides the pronunciation — "ordinal prefix".
全: Jade 玉 put away 入 for safe-keeping — "complete, whole".
先: Someone stepping 止 in front of another person 儿 — "first, before".
给: 纟 (silk) marks the meaning while 合 (hé, to combine) hints the sound — "to give".
电: Simplified form of 電; lightning 申 from a storm cloud 雨 — "electricity".
次: A person 欠 yawning multiple times 冫 — "time, order".
正: A foot 止 stopping in the right place 一 — "just, correct".
美: A person 大 wearing an elegant crown 羊 — "beautiful, America".
部: 阝 (place) marks the meaning while 咅 (pǒu, to spit out) hints the sound — "part, section".
间: The sun 日 shining through a doorway 门 — "between, space".
意: 心 (heart) marks the meaning while 音 (yīn, sound) hints the sound — "meaning, idea".
四: A child 儿 in a room with four walls 囗 — "four".
向: 口 (mouth; entrance, gate, opening) marks the meaning — "towards, direction".
机: A table 几 made of wood 木; 几 also provides the pronunciation — "machine".
表: Fur 毛 clothing 衣; a shawl or wrap — "surface, to express".
化: 匕 (spoon, ladle; knife, dirk) marks the meaning; 亻 (rén) partners with — "to change, -ize".
觉: 见 (to see) marks the meaning while ⺍ hints the sound — "to feel / sleep".
路: 足 (foot) marks the meaning while 各 (gè, individual) hints the sound — "road, way".
反: A hand 又 held up against a cliff 厂 — "opposite, reverse".
应: 广 (broad, vast, wide; building, house) marks the meaning — "should / to respond".
情: 忄 (heart) marks the meaning while 青 (qīng, nature's color) hints the sound — "feeling, emotion".
性: 忄 (heart) marks the meaning while 生 (shēng, life) hints the sound — "nature, gender".
点: 灬 (fire) marks the meaning while 占 (zhàn, to divine) hints the sound — "point, dot, a little".
记: A private 己 note 讠; 己 also provides the pronunciation — "to record, remember".
原: 厂 (cliff) marks the meaning while 泉 (quán, spring) hints the sound — "original, plain".
内: A man 人 entering a door 冂 — "inside, inner".
五: Five elements (the cross with the extra stroke) between heaven 一 and earth 一 — "five".
今: A mouth 亼 talking about things — "today, now".
管: ⺮ (bamboo) marks the meaning while 官 (guān, official) hints the sound — "to manage, tube".
期: 月 (moon) marks the meaning while 其 (qí, his) hints the sound — "period, expect".
指: To point 旨 by hand 扌; 旨 also provides the pronunciation — "finger, to point".
体: 亻 (man, person; people) marks the meaning; 本 (běn) partners with — "body, form".
利: Harvesting 刂 grain 禾 — "advantage, profit".
政: 攵 (to rap) marks the meaning while 正 (zhèng, straight) hints the sound — "politics, government".
号: 口 (mouth) marks the meaning while 丂 (kǎo, obstruction of breath (qi)) hints the sound — "mark, number".
由: Road 丨 leading to the farm 田 — "from, by, reason".
战: 戈 (spear) marks the meaning while 占 (zhàn, to divine) hints the sound — "war, battle".
立: A man standing on the ground 一 — "to stand, establish".
代: A man 亻 caught 弋 by the passing of time — "generation, era".
品: Something that everyone is talking 口 about — "product, goods".
门: An open doorway or gate — "door, gate".
提: 扌 (hand) marks the meaning while 是 (shì, to be) hints the sound — "to raise, mention".
相: To stare 目 at a tree 木, meaning to observe — "each other / appearance".
白: A burning candle; the rays of the sun — "white, clear".
定: A person 疋 settling under a roof 宀 — "to fix, decide".
放: 攵 (to rap) marks the meaning while 方 (fāng, square) hints the sound — "to release, put".
特: 牛 (ox) marks the meaning while 寺 (sì, court) hints the sound — "special".
名: A name called out 口 to hail someone at night 夕 — "name".
制: 刂 (knife) marks the meaning while 巾 (jīn, cloth) hints the sound — "to make, system".
造: 辶 (to walk) marks the meaning while 告 (gào, to tell) hints the sound — "to make, create".
教: 攵 (to rap) marks the meaning while 孝 (xiào, filial piety) hints the sound — "to teach / religion".
必: 心 (heart; mind; soul) marks the meaning; 丿 (piě) partners with — "must, certainly".
条: 木 (tree; wood, lumber; wooden) marks the meaning; 夂 (zhǐ) partners with — "strip, item".
至: A bird alighting on the ground 土 — "to, until".
却: 卩 (seal) marks the meaning while 去 (qù, to go away) hints the sound — "yet, however".
知: 口 (mouth) marks the meaning while 矢 (shǐ, arrow) hints the sound — "to know".
王: A man 十 bridging heaven and earth (both 一) — "king".
叫: 口 (mouth) marks the meaning while 丩 (jiū, to connect) hints the sound — "to call, be called".
打: 扌 (hand) marks the meaning while 丁 (dīng, male adult) hints the sound — "to hit, strike".
书: A mark made by a pen ⺺ — "book".
场: 土 (soil) marks the meaning while 昜 (yáng, bright) hints the sound — "field, place".
元: A man 儿 with two lines emphasizing their head 二 — "dollar, origin".
总: Many mouths 口 speaking with one mind 心 — "total, general".
报: A hand 扌 cuffing 又 a criminal 卩, representing sentencing — "newspaper, report".
才: A sprout growing in the ground, representing a budding talent — "talent, just".
目: An eye drawn on its side — "eye, item".
认: 讠 (words) marks the meaning while 人 (rén, man) hints the sound — "to recognize".
社: An earth 土 spirit 礻; 礻 also provides the pronunciation — "society".
更: 曰 (to speak; to say) marks the meaning — "more, even more".
关: 丷 (kwukyel) marks the meaning; 天 (tiān) partners with — "to close, concern".
真: A straight 直 (that is, level) table 几 — "true, real".
少: Grains of sand; 小 provides the pronunciation and meaning — "few, little / young".
些: 二 (two) marks the meaning while 此 (cǐ, this) hints the sound — "some".
接: 扌 (hand) marks the meaning while 妾 (qiè, concubine) hints the sound — "to receive, connect".
史: A hand 乂 using a pen to record a history — "history".
受: Something 冖 passed from one hand 爫 to another 又 — "to receive, bear".
处: To go somewhere 夂 and put down a flag 卜 — "to deal with / place".
义: ⺷ marks the meaning while 乂 (yì, to govern) hints the sound — "justice, meaning".
思: Weighing something with your mind 囟 (altered) and heart 心 — "to think".
听: Words 口 reaching an ear 斤 — "to listen".
任: 亻 (man) marks the meaning while 壬 (rén, 9th heavenly stem) hints the sound — "to appoint, allow".
转: 车 (cart) marks the meaning while 专 (zhuān, concentrated) hints the sound — "to turn".
军: Soldiers 冖 (distorted 力) in a cart 车 — "army, military".
该: 讠 (words) marks the meaning while 亥 (hài, 12th terrestrial branch) hints the sound — "should, ought to".
信: 亻 (man, person; people) marks the meaning; 言 (yán) partners with — "letter, to believe".
便: 亻 (man, person; people) marks the meaning; 更 (gèng) partners with — "convenient, then".
收: 攵 (to rap) marks the meaning while 丩 (jiū, to connect) hints the sound — "to receive, collect".
业: 一 (one; a, an; alone) marks the meaning — "business, industry".
六: 八 (eight; all around, all sides) marks the meaning; 亠 (tóu) partners with — "six".
调: 讠 (words) marks the meaning while 周 (zhōu, Zhou dynasty) hints the sound — "to adjust / tone".
算: A bamboo ⺮ abacus 具 — "to calculate, count".
决: 冫 (ice) marks the meaning; 夬 (guài) partners with — "to decide".
加: Supporting a cause with the strength 力 of one's words 口 — "to add, plus".
式: A craftsman using an awl 弋 and a measuring square 工 — "style, form".
际: 阝 (place) marks the meaning while 示 (shì, altar) hints the sound — "border, international".
斯: 斤 (a catty (about 500 grams); an axe; keen, shrewd) marks the meaning; 其 (qí) partners with — "this (transliteration)".
石: A rock 口 at the base of a cliff 厂 — "stone, rock".
运: 辶 (to walk) marks the meaning while 云 (yún, cloud) hints the sound — "to transport, luck".
离: An animal standing straight; 亠 is the head — "to leave, from".
规: 见 (to see) marks the meaning while 夫 (fū, man) hints the sound — "rule, regulation".
程: 禾 (cereal) marks the meaning while 呈 (chéng, to petition) hints the sound — "rule, journey".
导: A hand 寸 pointing the way to someplace 巳 — "to lead, guide".
术: 木 (tree; wood, lumber; wooden) marks the meaning; 丶 (diǎn) partners with — "skill, technique".
步: Modern form of 歨; putting one foot 止 in front of the other — "step, pace".
